import React,{useState} from 'react' const CatComponent = (props)=>{ const [current, setCurrent] = useState(0) const handleNext = (e)=>{ if(current > 0){ document.getElementById('previous').style.color = 'blue' } else if(props.posts.cat.length-1 === current){ document.getElementById('next').style.color = '#e6e6e6' }else{ setCurrent(current+1) } } const handlePrevious = (e)=>{ if(current ===0 ) {document.getElementById('previous').style.color = 'blue' document.getElementById('next').style.color = 'grey' } else{ setCurrent(current-1)} } return(
{props.intro.caption}
{props.intro.category}
{props.posts.cat[current]}
Latest News
{props.posts.latest_news}
Top News
{props.posts.top_news}
) } export default CatComponent
